1489180.name: Quench Art Book & Guide
1489180.description:
Everything you'd want to know about the world of Quench!


The World of Quench: Art Book & Guide is 60+ pages packed full of tips, tricks, lore and concept art from the making of Quench. Learn how to best use your powers to your advantage, get a full walkthrough of each level, and revisit the art and story of the game including nine original pieces made by artists from around the world.

Please note: This book contains major spoilers for the story of Quench! The first chapter deals with mechanics only, but subsequent chapters reveal elements of the plot and should be avoided until you complete the game, if you don't want to follow a walkthrough.

The Art Book & Guide is presented as a digital book in PDF format and can be accessed from the Quench install folder.
